description.value: You can take a Magic|XPHB action to blow this horn. In response, warrior spirits from the plane of Ysgard appear in unoccupied spaces within 60 feet of you. Each spirit uses the Berserker|XMM stat block and returns to Ysgard after 1 hour or when it drops to 0 Hit Points|XPHB. The spirits look like living, breathing warriors, and they have Immunity|XPHB to the Charmed|XPHB and Frightened|XPHB conditions. Once you use the horn, it can't be used again until 7 days have passed. A silver horn summons 2 Berserker|XMM|Berserkers. They are Friendly [Attitude]|XPHB|Friendly to you and your allies and follow your commands.
